text: Test out small snippets of Django code
I am still in the development phase of a Django App.
Before even writing my views.py, I test them out to see if my models are correctly defined.
This I do it in the terminal by invoking
But oh so often I make some syntax error prompting me to abort the shell ctrl-D & retype everything.
It would be better if I could write all this in some file just for my trials & if all's well copy it to views.py.
Is it as simple as creating a trial.py in my app directory.
Won't I have to import the Django env?
What's the best way to do this?
